CNN Breaking US & World News

Brief:

CNN Breaking US & World News is the essential mobile app for staying up-to-date with world events and national news. Developed with a user-centric approach, this app brings you live broadcasts, in-depth stories, and multimedia content, all tailored to provide a comprehensive news experience.

  • üõéÔ∏è Custom Alert Settings: Fine-tune your alerts to get the news that matters without the noise.
  • üì∫ Live TV: Stream CNN, CNNi, and HLN live on your device for news anytime, anywhere.*
  • üìö In-Depth Content: Dive deep into breaking news with detailed articles, photo galleries, and video clips.
  • üåü Exclusive Programming: Enjoy CNN Original Series like ‚ÄúAnthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown‚Äù and watch renowned CNN Shows including ‚ÄúAnderson Cooper 360‚Äù.
  • üé¨ Video on Demand: Access a rich library of on-demand content whenever you wish.

Pros:
